verification_tests.description: Verify all variants map correctly to canonical forms
verification_tests.criteria: Each variant must map to exactly one canonical form

verification_tests.description: Verify all ligature components exist in corpus
verification_tests.criteria: Each component must be a valid glyph or semantic concept

verification_tests.description: Verify no conflicts in variant/canonical assignments
verification_tests.criteria: No glyph should be both canonical and variant simultaneously
